title: When I wake up and there are over 100 replies to read through

replies.body:
When I wake up, and there are no responses, and one downvote.

... \*sniffle\*...
I see 5 responses after writing in gameplay and think "Oh god, who did I just piss off now" .__.
I wish it was as simple as not posting. I wish.

I left the boards for a week, now I'm slowly working through all the posts that happened while I was away.
It's a bit of a nuisance.
